external_games.name: Hidden Object: Mystics in the Cinema - Gold Version

name: Hidden Object: Mystics in the Cinema - Gold Version
summary: Tonight was going to be calm and quiet. But suddenly the silence was broken by a call that heralded an unusual event in the city. My sister called me and said that in the cinema, where the film was shown, suddenly all the characters became alive and penetrated into our world! What could revive them!? This is a puzzle you should solve!
